alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 6:28PM EDT until June 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MECKLENBURG AND SOUTHEASTERN LUNENBURG COUNTIES... At 628 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Wilsons to near Dundas to Norlina to 8 miles south of Creedmoor, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Dundas around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Lafoon Corner, Bacons Fork, Gills Corner, Beechwood, Bracey, Forksville, Palmer Springs and Lake Gaston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
